ygData.subject: I'm done
ygData.msgSnippet: I m sorry, but I can t do this any more. I keep saying that I m coming back, and than I don t. It s not fair too all of you. So I ve decided to take a

Subject: I'm done
Message-ID: <909557+m6dd@...>
User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Length: 1134
X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: minime_316@...

I'm sorry, but I can't do this any more. I keep saying that I'm 
coming back, and than I don't. It's not fair too all of you. So I've 
decided to take a *temperary* leave of the club. Meaning I could come 
back, but probably not, and if I did it wouldn't be till February or 
March. I'm giving The Trainers to Cyberwolf. The two chars I did 
bring in, I'll svae them till when and if I come back. Please don't 
take me off the list. I plan on stopping by once a month to give you 
an update on my personnal problems, catch up on things, and tell you 
how close I am till returning. Well, this is goodbye. Thank You all. 
I will miss you very much, even those who I have gotten into 
arguements with. I wish you all a Merry Christmas, Happy Hawnaka
(spelling?), Happy Kwaanza, happy New Years's, Happy Valentine's Day, 
Happy Easter, Happy Yom Kipur, and all those other holidays. Until we 
all meet again in that great big Cybertron in the sky, goodbye.

Your  friend, Mike Smith(You may think that's a phony name, but it 
ain't! The Frank Reinhart thing is just my e-mail name.)




P.S. Sunday's my birthday, if you'd like to know.
